main module¶

The core functions of Sentinel Hindcast

Note

Download API’s, processors, and adapters are imported dynamically to make Sentinel Hindcast also work on systems, where some of them might not be available.

main.do_hindcast(env, params, l2_path, max_parallel_downloads=1, max_parallel_processors=1, max_parallel_adapters=1)¶
main.hindcast(params_file, env_file=None, max_parallel_downloads=1, max_parallel_processors=1, max_parallel_adapters=1)¶

Main function for running Sentinel Hindcast. First initialises the hindcast and then processes input parameters.

params_file

Parameters read from the .ini input file

env_file
Default: None
Environment settings read from the environment .ini file
max_parallel_downloads
Default: 1
Maximum number of parallel downloads of satellite images
max_parallel_processors
Default: 1
Maximum number of processors to run in parallel
max_parallel_adapters
Default: 1
Maximum number of adapters to run in parallel
main.hindcast_product_group(env, params, do_download, auth, download_requests, l1product_paths, l2_path, semaphores, date)¶

hindcast a set of products with the same sensing date
